body:
This strikes me as a by reference or by value thing. 

The pain of copy and paste is more ugly than the temporary indirection that alias adds. Temporary code duplication would isolate client teams from the refactoring, giving them enough overlapping time to refactor before the original package is deprecated. 

I think an indirection such as this proposal will be net damaging.

Temporary ugliness to solve the problem can be achieved in another way.

Btw @pciet vendoring does not solve this in a monorepo scenario.
